headline.main: BRITISH SPY HERE ON A NAZI PASSPORT; Brings Bride He Wed After Escaping Yugoslav Camp

lead_paragraph: Among the ninety passengers who arrived yesterday aboard the American President liner President Hayes was Dr. John J. Umgeher, formerly of the research staff of the University of Belgrade, who was traveling on a German passport with an American visa and with the permission of the British Government.
